wordGroup: diesel locomotive 柴油机车；内油机车
locomotive engine 机车发动机；机车蒸汽机

sentences.en: He was killed by an onrushing locomotive.
sentences.cn: 他被飞驰而来的火车头撞死了。

sentences.en: This was before the steam locomotive, and canal building was at its height.
sentences.cn: 这些事情都发生在蒸汽火车出现之前，而且，运河修建在那时正处于繁荣时期。

sentences.en: At the conductor's whistle the engine-driver starts his locomotive-engine.
sentences.cn: 乘务员哨声一响， 司机开动机车。
